tuv.seg: A consumer hire agreement in Ireland, is an agreement where an item is leased or rented from a financial institution or finance company
Is comhaontú é comhaontú fruilithe tomhaltóra ina dtógtar sócmhainn ar chíos nó ar léas ó institiúid airgeadais nó cuideachta airgeadais
Instead of borrowing money to buy a product, the consumer rents the goods from the leasing company that has bought the product
In áit airgid a fháil ar iasacht chun sócmhainn a cheannach, tógann an tomhaltóir na hearraí ar cíos ón gcuideachta léasa ar léi an tsócmhainn
The leasing company hires the goods out to the consumer in return for rental or hire charge
Ligeann an chuideachta léasa na hearraí ar cíos don tomhaltóir ar tháille chíosa nó fruilithe
As a result, the goods remain the property of the leasing company
Dá bharr sin, is in úinéireacht na cuideachta léasa a fhanann na hearraí i gcónaí
However, in some lease agreements, there is a clause that allows the consumer to purchase the product, at an agreed sum set down in a lease agreement
Bíonn alt i roinnt comhaontuithe léasa, áfach, a thugann cead don tomhaltóir an tsócmhainn a cheannach ar phraghas atá leagtha síos i gcomhaontú léasa
The term of the lease can vary from a few months to a few years
D'fhéadfadh tréimhsí éagsúla léasa a bheith i gceist

There is usually a distinction made between an "operating lease", which generally lasts for a short period of time, and a "finance lease", which involves larger items leased over longer periods of time
De ghnáth, déantar idirdhealú idir "léas feidhmiúcháin" a mhaireann go hiondúil ar feadh tréimhse gairid, agus "léas airgeadais" a bhaineann le hearraí níos mó léasaithe thar tréimhsí níos faide
A consumer hire agreement is drawn up and signed by the consumer and on behalf of the lending institution
Leagtar amach comhaontú fruilithe tomhaltóra agus síníonn an tomhaltóir é agus sínítear é thar ceann na hinstitiúde iasachta
• What asset or product the agreement refers to (often including a detailed description)
• An tsócmhainn a mbaineann an comhaontú léi (mionchuntas san áireamh go minic)
• The cash price of the goods
• Praghas na n-earraí ar airgead síos
• The hire purchase price, which is the total sum payable to complete the purchase of the goods, if the agreement allows the consumer to purchase the goods
• An praghas fruilcheannaigh, is é sin an tsuim iomlán a bheidh le n-íoc chun ceannach na hearraí a chur i gcrích, más amhlaidh go gceadaíonn an comhaontú don tomhaltóir na hearraí a cheannach
• The amount of each installment by which the hire purchase price is to be paid
• Méid gach tráthchuid lena n-íocfar an praghas fruilcheannaigh
• The date each installment is to be paid
• An dáta ar a gcaithfear gach tráthchuid a íoc
• If the agreement is for a certain period of time, the number of installments
• Má bhaineann tréimhse áirithe leis an gcomhaontú, líon na dtráthchodanna
• The total amount payable under the agreement including taxes
• An tsuim iomlán atá iníoctha faoin gcomhaontú, cánacha san áireamh
• The names and addresses of all parties to the agreement
• Ainm agus seoladh gach páirtí sa chomhaontú
• The name and address of the supplier of the goods to which the agreement relates
• Ainm agus seoladh soláthraí na n-earraí a bhaineann leis an gcomhaontú
• Any additional costs to be paid
• Costais bhreise ar bith atá iníoctha
• The cost of early termination of the agreement
• Costas foirceannadh luath an chomhaontaithe
• The costs or penalties liable by the consumer if there is a failure on his or her part to comply with the terms of the agreement
• Na costais nó pionóis a ghearrfar ar an tomhaltóir muna gcloíonn sé/sí le téarmaí an chomhaontaithe
• A statement that the consumer has the right to withdraw from the agreement within 10 days of receiving a copy of the agreement
• Ráiteas a leagann síos an ceart atá ag an tomhaltóir éirí as an gcomhaontú taobh istigh de 10 lá ón dáta a fhaigheann sé/sí cóip den chomhaontú
• A statement that the agreement is for the letting of goods and that the goods in question remain the property of the owner (i.e
• Ráiteas a leagann síos go mbaineann an comhaontú le hearraí a ligean ar cíos agus gur maoin an úinéara atá iontu i gcónaí
the leasing company) • A statement that the consumer must inform the owner (i.e.the leasing company) as to the whereabouts of the goods to which the agreement relates
• Ráiteas a leagann síos go gcaithfidh an tomhaltóir an t-úinéir a chur ar an eolas maidir le cá bhfuil na hearraí a mbaineann an comhaontú leo
• The words "Consumer Hire Agreement" must be stated clearly and in a prominent position on the agreement form
• Ní foláir na focail "Comhaontú Fruilithe Tomhaltóra" a breacadh go soiléir agus in áit fheiceálach ar an bhfoirm chomhaontaithe
• Any clause stating that the consumer has the option of purchasing goods
• Alt ar bith a dheireann go bhfuil an rogha ag an tomhaltóir earraí a cheannach
Unless the requirements specified here are adhered to, the owner of the goods (i.e. the leasing company) may not be entitled to enforce the agreement
Ní ghá go mbeadh úinéir na n-earraí i dteideal an chomhaontaithe a chur i bhfeidhm muna gcloítear leis na coinníollacha atá leagtha síos anseo
If the goods you receive are faulty, you are entitled to your money back if you so wish
Má tá na hearraí a fhaigheann tú lochtach, tá an ceart agat d'airgead a fháil ar ais, má tá tú ag iarraidh
The supplier is obliged to offer you your money back
Tá iachall ar an soláthraí d'airgead a thairiscint ar ais duit
Alternatively, you can ask for substitute goods
Mar rogha ar sin, d'fheadfá earraí eile a iarraidh air/uirthi
If you damage goods when using them under a consumer hire agreement, you will usually have to pay for the repairs yourself, unless it is stated differently in the agreement
Má dhéanann tú damáiste d'earraí agus tú á n-úsáid faoi chomhaontú fruilithe tomhaltóra, bíonn ort íoc as na deisiúcháin tú féin go hiondúil muna bhfuil socrú eile sa chomhaontú
Advertising of consumer hire agreements
Fograíocht a dhéanamh ar chomhaontuithe fruilithe tomhaltóra
The fact that ownership does not pass to the consumer in a leasing agreement must be stated in any advertising
Ní foláir a rá go soiléir i bhfograíocht ar bith nach bhfaigheann an tomhaltóir úinéireacht ar earraí faoi chomhaontú léasa
Statements like "Letting, Hiring or Leasing of the Goods only" and "The Goods Remain the Property of the Owner" should be included
Ba cheart ráitis mar shampla "Earraí ar cíos, fruilithe, nó léasaithe amháin" agus "Fanann na hearraí in úinéireacht an úinéara" a chur ann
These statements should be in at least as prominent a position as any sum payable by the consumer and enclosed in a boundary box in the case of a visual advertisement
Ní foláir do na ráitis seo a bheith in áit chomh feiceálach céanna le suim ar bith atá iníoctha ag an tomhaltóir agus laistigh de bhosca teorantach i gcás fograíochta radharcach
The amount that is payable by the consumer must be indicated in the advertisement and be fully inclusive of all amounts including taxes
Ní foláir an tsuim atá iníoctha ag an tomhaltóir a lua san fhógraíocht, agus í a bheith iomlán, cánacha san áireamh
Different lending institutions offer different rates for leasing facilities
Tairiscíonn institiúidí iasachta éagsúla rátaí éagsúla ar léasanna
Contact your local financial institutions or check your local telephone directory for a listing of finance companies
Téigh i dteagmháil le d'institiúidí airgeadais áitiúla, nó breathnaigh i d'eolaire teileafóin áitiúil chun liosta comhlachtaí airgeadais a fháil
To enter into a consumer hire agreement, you will need at least two forms of identification that must include a photo identification and proof of address
Chun a bheith páirteach i gcomhaontú fruilithe tomhaltóra, beidh ar a laghad dhá chineál aitheantais ag teastáil. Caithfidh griangraf agus dearbhú seolta a bheith san áireamh
A current driver's licence, passport, student card and a recent household bill such as a gas, electricity or telephone bill are all acceptable forms of identification
Glactar le ceadúnas tiomána reatha, pas, cárta mic léinn agus bille teaghlaigh mar shampla bille gáis, leictreachais nó teileafóin
There are alternative arrangements in place for establishing the identity of people who do not possess this documentation
Tá socruithe eile i bhfeidhm chun a dhearbhú cé hiad na daoine nach bhfuil an doiciméadú seo acu
Making a complaint about a consumer hire agreement
Gearán a dhéanamh faoi chomhaontú fruilithe tomhaltóra
When you purchase goods as a consumer, you have a number of rights under the Sale of Goods and Supply of Services Act 1980
Nuair a bheidh tú earraí a cheannach mar thomhaltóir, tá líon áirithe de chearta faoin Acht um Dhíol Earraí agus Soláthar Seirbhísí 1980
If you are dissatisfied with goods received under a consumer hire agreement, you should make your complaint to the retailer who sold you the goods under the agreement
Má tá tú míshásta le hearraí a fuair tú faoi chomhaontú fruilithe tomhaltóra, ba cheart duit do ghearán a dhéanamh leis an miondíoltóir a dhíol na hearraí leat faoin gcomhaontú
You should complain in writing as soon as possible, as your rights of redress decrease with time
Ba cheart duit gearán scríofa a dhéanamh chomh luath agus is féidir, mar laghdaíonn do chearta sásaimh le himeacht ama
If you are unhappy with the retailer's response, you should contact the Competition and Consumer Protection Commission (CCPC)
Muna bhfuil tú sásta le freagra an mhiondíoltóra, ba cheart duit dul i dteagmháil leis an Coimisiún um Iomaíocht agus Cosaint Tomhaltóirí (CCPC)
The CCPC advises consumers in general terms about consumer law
Cuireann an CCPC comhairle ginearálta ar thomhaltóirí maidir le dlí tomhaltóra

It cannot give a decision on individual disputes between a consumer and a supplier as only a court can order a trader to give you compensation, but it can investigate various practices relating to the terms on which goods or services are supplied

Ní féidir leis cinneadh a dhéanamh ar aighneas ar leith idir tomhaltóir agus soláthraí, mar is í an chúirt amháin gur féidir léi ordú a thabhairt do thradálaí cúiteamh a thabhairt duit, ach d'fhéadfadh sé cleachtais éagsúla a bhaineann leis na coinníollacha faoina soláthraítear earraí agus seirbhísí a scrúdú
If you cannot reach a solution with the retailer in relation to the goods, you can seek legal advice
Muna bhfuil tú in ann a theacht ar réiteach leis an miondíoltóir, d'fhéadfá comhairle dlí a chuartú
If the product in question does not exceed €2,000, you can use the Small Claims Court, which does not require a solicitor
Muna bhfuil praghas an táirge os cionn €2,000, d'fhéadfá úsáid a bhaint as Cúirt na nÉileamh Beag. Ní bhíonn dlíodóir ag teastáil
Lodging a claim costs €25, which is non-refundable
Cosnaíonn sé €25 chun éileamh a chur isteach, agus tá sé seo neamhaisíoctha
If, however, the product exceeds €2,000, you can appoint a solicitor who will act on your behalf and the matter must be brought before the District Court
Más fiú os cionn €2,000 an táirge, d'fhéadfá dlíodóir a cheapadh chun feidhmiú ar do shon agus ní foláir an cás a thabhairt chuig an gCúirt Dúiche
If your complaint refers to a product costing more than €15,000 the case will be heard in the Circuit Court
Má bhaineann do ghearán le táirge a chosnaíonn níos mó ná €15,000, éisteoidh an Chúirt Chuarda leis an gcás

If you wish to complain about a consumer hire agreement made with a bank, a building society or a finance house that has been prescribed as a credit institution under the Consumer Credit Act, 1995, you should contact the Financial Services Ombudsman

Más mian leat gearán a dhéanamh faoi chomhaontú fruilithe tomhaltóra le banc, cumann foirgníochta nó institiúid airgeadais a bhfuil aitheantas tugtha dó mar institiúid chreidmheasa faoin Acht Um Chreidmheas Tomhaltóra 1995, ba cheart duit dul i dteaghmháil le Fear an Phobail d'Institiúidí Creidmheasa
The Ombudsman can investigate complaints such as unfair treatment, uncorrected mistakes, poor service, poor administration, negligence and breach of contract/confidentiality
Tá Fear an Phobail in ann gearáin faoi úsáid mí-chothom, botúin nár ceartaíodh, drochsheirbhís, drochriaracháin, faillí agus sarú conartha/iontaobhais a iniúchadh
